intro.description:
Welcome to the tutorial to create some mappings.
It will step by step guide you through the process of retyping and renaming.
You must have loaded a source and a target schema before following this guide.

item.title: Retype
item.description:
You first need to retype once between features from your source and target schema.
Click the Add new Relation button in the top toolbar to open the "New Relation" wizard.
Choose Retype.
Now a type from source and target. Click on "..." to see a list of possible types.
Click Finish.
Alternatively you can select a source and target type in the Schema Explorer, click the arrow in between and choose Retype.
Then the Retype dialog opens, but now you can directly choose the selected types from the dropdown field.
